properties.Name: ClaimPaymentType
properties.Description:
The type of insurance payout associated with a specific claim payout.

Ex:
-  Lump sum
-  Partial payment
-  Advanced payment

where:

Lump sum 
With a lump-sum payout you receive all of the funds you are entitled to in one payment.

Partial payment 
A partial payment is contingent on certain conditions -Your insurance company may provide only partial payment on your claim if certain conditions are met, such as if a qualified contractor is secured to do necessary repair work on insured property or assets.

Advance payment
An advance payment may be made for an insurance claim for immediate needs, such as safe housing, food and clothing after a natural disaster.

Columns.Name: ClaimPaymentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a claim payment type.

Columns.Name: ClaimPaymentTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a claim payment type.

Columns.Name: ClaimPaymentTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a claim payment type.

Properties.Description:
The type of insurance payout associated with a specific claim payout.

Ex:
-  Lump sum
-  Partial payment
-  Advanced payment

where:

Lump sum 
With a lump-sum payout you receive all of the funds you are entitled to in one payment.

Partial payment 
A partial payment is contingent on certain conditions -Your insurance company may provide only partial payment on your claim if certain conditions are met, such as if a qualified contractor is secured to do necessary repair work on insured property or assets.

Advance payment
An advance payment may be made for an insurance claim for immediate needs, such as safe housing, food and clothing after a natural disaster.
